Message: The user completes the submission of the form

i got this rejection how do I fix it? will adding text to my page help? Your ad contains inappropriate images that are in violation of our Advertising Policy. Please update your creatives with an appropriate image.

It looks like your ad was rejected due to inappropriate images. To fix this, you'll need to update your ad with appropriate images that comply with our Advertising Policy. Adding text to your page won't resolve the issue if the problem is with the images. Make sure to review the specific rejection reason in the email you received and replace the images accordingly. For more detailed guidance, you can refer to this article: [My ad got rejected. What's next?](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/18085960681101-My-ad-got-rejected-What-s-next).
i dont see the email where is it can you send me the email with the resons?
Connecting you to a live agent. Please hold.

Message: I've sent you an email with the details regarding your ad rejection. Please check your inbox for more information. If you have any further questions, feel free to ask!
Hi can you tell me exacly which images I need to change

Hi Jacob, apologies for the delayed response. I'm happy to help.

I noticed that you sent in a ticket via ad support as well. However, it seems you have multiple organizations as well as multiple ad accounts. If you can please provide the specific IDs for which accounts you have questions about, I can further assist.
